Introduction

THE MAN BLK (Korean: 더 맨 블랙; Japanese: ザ・マン・ブラック) is a 3-member "multi-tainer" boy group under Stardium. They debuted on November 15, 2018 with their first mini album Various Colors. The group originally consisted of 10 members.

Seung, Sungyong and Hyeongseok left the group on June 24th, 2020.

Jinhwan, Junwon, Chanyi and Woojin left on March 3rd, 2021.

Presumed to have silently disbanded some time around 2021 as there have been no social media posts since November 2020, and 4 more members have announced their departure.
